summary: This document appears to be a maintenance report for an aircraft with registration N120JE, detailing various repairs and alterations made to the aircraft. It includes information about the installation of flight management systems and other equipment to meet airworthiness requirements. The document is significant as it outlines compliance with FAA regulations and the involvement of multiple parties in the maintenance process. This document contains various statements of compliance with airworthiness standards for Gulfstream G-IV aircraft, specifically focusing on modifications and repairs made to the aircraft. It includes details about the installation of systems, compliance with FAA regulations, and the necessary documentation for airworthiness certification. This document contains multiple FAA Form 337 entries related to major repairs and alterations made to a Gulfstream G-IV aircraft, registration N423TT. It details the work accomplished, including the installation of an AirCell ATG 4000 high-speed internet system and various other modifications, along with compliance statements and approvals from relevant authorities. This document contains multiple FAA Form 337 entries detailing major repairs and alterations made to Gulfstream G-IV aircraft, specifically serial number 1085. It includes information about various modifications, repairs, and compliance with FAA regulations, including installation of new equipment and alterations to existing systems. This document contains multiple FAA forms related to major repairs and alterations made to a Gulfstream G-IV aircraft, registration N677RP, owned by Petersen Aviation. The forms detail various upgrades and modifications performed on the aircraft's systems, including avionics and entertainment systems, along with compliance with FAA regulations. This document contains maintenance instructions for the ProScan PS8680Z Digital Video Disk (DVD) Player installed in an aircraft. It outlines the obligations of the aircraft operator regarding maintenance, inspections, and repairs related to the DVD system, emphasizing the need for proper documentation and adherence to FAA regulations. This document contains various FAA forms and reports related to the compliance of materials used in the Gulfstream GIV aircraft with fire safety regulations. It details the testing of materials for flammability and fireblocking, including descriptions of the materials used and the results of the tests conducted. The document is significant as it provides evidence of compliance with federal aviation safety standards. This document contains technical specifications and test plans related to the flammability testing of fabrics used in Gulfstream G-IV aircraft interiors. It includes details about the materials, testing procedures, and compliance with FAA regulations. The document is subject to a protective order, indicating sensitive information. This document provides structural substantiation for the installation of two 17-inch LCD monitors and an entertainment system modification on a Gulfstream G-IV aircraft. It includes detailed engineering specifications and compliance with Federal Aviation Regulations, indicating the modifications made to the aircraft's interior. This document contains multiple FAA repair and alteration reports for a Gulfstream GIV aircraft, serial number 1085, registered as N88GA. It details various modifications and repairs performed on the aircraft, including weight and balance adjustments, installation of new equipment, and compliance with FAA regulations. This document details the repair and alteration work performed on a Gulfstream GIV aircraft, including modifications to cabin air ducts, temperature sensors, and installation of desiccant systems. It outlines compliance with FAA regulations and specifications from K-C Aviation, Inc. This document details various repairs and alterations made to a Gulfstream Aerospace G-IV aircraft, including modifications to the cabin pressure control system, installation of new equipment, and compliance with FAA regulations. It outlines the work performed, parts used, and the impact on the aircraft's weight and balance. This document contains various entries related to the maintenance and modifications of Gulfstream G-IV aircraft, detailing repairs, alterations, and compliance with FAA regulations. It includes references to specific service changes, wiring modifications, and operational tests performed on the aircraft.

events.title: Aircraft Maintenance and Alteration
events.description: Various repairs and installations were completed on the aircraft N120JE to meet FAA airworthiness requirements.

events.title: Approval for Return to Service
events.description: Michael E. Hughes certifies repairs and alterations made to the aircraft.

events.title: Authorization of STC use
events.description: Authorization is given for one-time usage of FAA Supplemental Type Certificate Number ST01625WI-D.

events.title: Installation of ELT
events.description: Installation of an Artex C-406-1 ELT and associated components.

events.title: Installation of TCAS System
events.description: The existing Honeywell TCAS II Traffic Collision Avoidance System was upgraded to be compliant with Minimum Operating Performance Standards.

events.title: Software Upgrade of Navigational Computer Units
events.description: Existing NZ-2000 Flight Management System Navigational Computer Units were sent for a software upgrade.

events.title: Installation of Entertainment Systems
events.description: Installation of new LCD monitors and a DVD player in the aircraft's cabin.

events.title: Flammability Testing
events.description: Flammability tests were conducted on various materials used in the Gulfstream GIV aircraft to ensure compliance with FAA regulations.

events.title: Interior Alteration Report
events.description: An interior alteration report was filed detailing modifications made to the Gulfstream GIV aircraft.

events.title: Aircraft Weight Record Update
events.description: The empty weight of the Gulfstream GIV was updated after various modifications.

events.title: FAA Approval for Return to Service
events.description: The aircraft was inspected and approved for return to service after repairs.

events.title: DER Approval for Modifications
events.description: A. Duncan provided DER approval for various modifications made to the aircraft.

events.title: ASC No. 130 Modification
events.description: Modification of the cockpit display unit fan circuitry to disable fans when all display master switches are off.

events.title: ASC No. 134 Installation
events.description: Installation of a time delay relay to prevent boost pump failures during electrical bus transfers.

locations: 6201 W Imperial Highway, Los Angeles, CA 90045
Two Embarcadero Center, San Francisco, CA 94111
